Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.viewers.toTerminal.interfaces

Class WTerminalSubTurnViewer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.viewers.toTerminal.interfaces.WTerminalSubTurnViewer
All Implemented Interfaces:
SpecificSubTurnViewer
Direct Known Subclasses:
WTerminalBuildPhase, WTerminalChooseCardsPhase, WTerminalFirstPlayerChoosePhase, WTerminalLoosePhase, WTerminalMovePhase, WTerminalOpponentBuildPhase, WTerminalOpponentMovePhase, WTerminalOpponentPlaceWorkerPhase, WTerminalOpponentSelectWorkerPhase, WTerminalPlaceWorkerPhase, WTerminalSelectMyCardPhase, WTerminalSelectWorkerPhase, WTerminalWinPhase
public abstract class WTerminalSubTurnViewer
extends java.lang.Object
implements SpecificSubTurnViewer
Abstract class with some methods to menage some command used by some sub classes
Author:
Marco

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected ViewCell calculateNextCell​(int direction)
    Method which calculates the cell at chosen direction and returns it if it is possible, returns null if the direction isn't correct and trow a NotFoundException if the cell isn't on the board ( or the select worker isn't on the board )
    boolean changePlayingPhase​(ViewSubTurn viewSubTurn)
    Tries to change subTurn and returns true if it can, or false if it can't
    protected void printDirection()
    Prints the table of direction with the number which represent the direction
    abstract void show()
    Abstract method used by sub classes to menage the their sub status
    protected void showCardsDetails​(boolean waitingPlayer)
    Method which prints the Name, Epithet and Description of all the player's God, then if waitingPLayer == true prints a string request and waits that the player press enter

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • show

      public abstract void show()
      Abstract method used by sub classes to menage the their sub status

    • showCardsDetails

      protected void showCardsDetails​(boolean waitingPlayer)
      Method which prints the Name, Epithet and Description of all the player's God, then if waitingPLayer == true prints a string request and waits that the player press enter
      Parameters:
      waitingPlayer - boolean parameter to wait an input to continue if waitingPLayer == true, or not if waitingPlayer == false

    • calculateNextCell

      protected ViewCell calculateNextCell​(int direction) throws NotFoundException
      Method which calculates the cell at chosen direction and returns it if it is possible, returns null if the direction isn't correct and trow a NotFoundException if the cell isn't on the board ( or the select worker isn't on the board )
      Parameters:
      direction - int to represent the direction
      Returns:
      ViewCell if there is a ViewWorker selected and a ViewCell at chosen direction
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the VIewCell or ViewWorker isn't found
      See Also:
      ViewWorker, ViewCell

    • printDirection

      protected void printDirection()
      Prints the table of direction with the number which represent the direction

    • changePlayingPhase

      public boolean changePlayingPhase​(ViewSubTurn viewSubTurn)
      Tries to change subTurn and returns true if it can, or false if it can't
      Parameters:
      viewSubTurn - subTurn reference
      Returns:
      True if the subTurn can be changed
